scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development LK_MODULE_CONTAINER=tutorialModules LK_MODULE=demo webpack --config node_modules/@labkey/build/webpack/dev.config.js --progress --profile --colors
scripts.build-prod: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production PROD_SOURCE_MAP=source-map LK_MODULE_CONTAINER=tutorialModules LK_MODULE=demo webpack --config node_modules/@labkey/build/webpack/prod.config.js --progress --profile --colors
scripts.clean: rimraf resources/web/demo/gen && rimraf resources/views/gen && rimraf resources/views/helloWorld* && rimraf resources/views/todoList*
